message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. I think this is a great deal, considering the product's value and the benefits it can bring to your business.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I'm willing to pay a premium for a great product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $850000. This is a great compromise that still reflects the product's value and the benefits it can bring to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to pay $775000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and the benefits it can bring to my business.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make another adjustment. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $800000. This is a fair price considering the product's value and the benefits it can bring to your business. I'm trying to find a sweet spot that works for both of us.
